abstract_summ: Coronavirus outbreak was first reported towards the end of 2019 and has now been declared a pandemic by the World Health Organization . A delay in detection and response has been recorded in China, as well as in other major countries, which led to an overburdening of the local health systems . Restrictive measures like social distancing, lockdown, case detection, isolation, contact tracing, and quarantine of exposed had revealed the most efficient actions to control the disease spreading .
